commit_list.repo_description: Extensible DSL for describing/defining Ruby objects

commit_list.message:
Fixed Validateable to be compatible with ActiveModel.

Fields without errors now return [] instead of nil.

Fixed CreditCard validations to remove confusing errors, updated tests.

* Error on missing (not invalid) card number.
* No error on missing type if number is also missing.
* No "invalid" or "expired" error on expiration month if year missing, nor on year if month is missing.
Added Railtie to require rspec/cells at initialization-time.
Moved top-level source file to match RSpec convention, updated docs.

Fixed CreditCard validations to remove confusing errors, updated tests.

* Error on missing (not invalid) card number.
* No error on missing type if number is also missing.

Refactored logging of DB operations to use Connection#instrument.

This allows for easy overriding, e.g. to ActiveSupport notifications.

Moved thread and socket classes into Connection for easy overriding.

This is necessary for use under em-synchrony, which uses Fibers instead of Threads and EventMachine instead of blocking sockets.

commit_list.message:
Defer connection until first use, instead of at configuration-time.

This is necessary for use with Thin, as it doesn't start the EventMachine reactor until the first request.
Note that, by default, the Railtie will still force the connection at initialization-time, but this can be overriden.

The old version of errbit we were using

commit_list.message:
Fixed Validateable to be compatible with ActiveModel.

Fields without errors now return [] instead of nil.

Fixed CreditCard validations to remove confusing errors, updated tests.

* Error on missing (not invalid) card number.
* No error on missing type if number is also missing.
* No "invalid" or "expired" error on expiration month if year missing, nor on year if month is missing.
Fixed RecycleBank monitoring for new RB user schema.
Changed RecyclebankMonitor time scale to hours (instead of days).
Added Transfer aggest to RecyclebankMonitor, tweaked TableMonitor.
Added monitor for RecycleBank backend process.
Added simple MySQL table age monitor.
Added processes running/stopped to poller monitor (for triggers).
Renamed 'down' to 'stopped', added metadata for labels.
Net/URL: changed ParamMap to use multimap (stupid Axis).
Net: added request completion detection, removed horrific kludge for unsized responses.
Net: added kludge for unsized text parts.
Net: changed Processor to be idempotent on add()/remove().
Net: fixed Request to handle unsized parts.
URL: reworked to used Named Parameter idiom.
URL: changed param delim from ';' to '&' (hack for Axis camera support).
MultipartResponse: fixed request(req) to abort in-progress response.
build: added Boost requirements to RPM.
URL: added default values to constructor.
build: fixed versioning for tagged releases.
build: added build-aux dir, fixed autogen.sh.
net: added hack for unsized text parts.
string: added cast in to<>() conversion; added conversion tests.
URL: added query, fragment; escape function.
inet: added socket-peer addr construct; moved some constructors to CPP file.
rpm: relaxed expat and pcre version requirements (for FC6).

cURL: fixes for older version (FC6)

* fixed URL param
* refactored recvBodyStart logic (firstFrag)
* removed onHeader (no longer used)
* updated ResponseTest.
MultipartResponse: add'l parse fix, updated tests.
Dir: expanded create() to make intermediate directories.
XML: initialize base in copy constructor (to avoid warnings).
Change libCurl version requirement to allow for FC6.
Transfer: added curl_multi support, AppLoop integration.
AppLoop: fix to allow repeated exec()/exit().
Changed install task to force old versions.
Added Transfer, Request, Response, and URI (and test).
Added install to CC rake task.
Removed Rakefile, moved auto-build logic to cruise_config.rb.

Fixed Validateable to be compatible with ActiveModel.

Fields without errors now return [] instead of nil.

Fixed CreditCard validations to remove confusing errors, updated tests.

* Error on missing (not invalid) card number.
* No error on missing type if number is also missing.
* No "invalid" or "expired" error on expiration month if year missing, nor on year if month is missing.
Changed dependency version requirements for mongo, bson, and bson_ext to use any patch version.

Defer connection until first use, instead of at configuration-time.

This is necessary for use with Thin, as it doesn't start the EventMachine reactor until the first request.
Note that, by default, the Railtie will still force the connection at initialization-time, but this can be overriden.

Defer connection until first use, instead of at configuration-time.

This is necessary for use with Thin, as it doesn't start the EventMachine reactor until the first request.
Note that, by default, the Railtie will still force the connection at initialization-time, but this can be overriden.
Updated docs with new website URL.

Defer connection until first use, instead of at configuration-time.

This is necessary for use with Thin, as it doesn't start the EventMachine reactor until the first request.
Note that, by default, the Railtie will still force the connection at initialization-time, but this can be overriden.

Defer connection until first use, instead of at configuration-time.

This is necessary for use with Thin, as it doesn't start the EventMachine reactor until the first request.
Note that, by default, the Railtie will still force the connection at initialization-time, but this can be overriden.
